Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class creates a player for the game.
    Author:
    Capki Kim, Daoun Oh

        public int movePiece(int fromRank,
                     int fromFile,
                     int toRank,
                     int toFile,
                     char pawnPromotionTo)
        Moves the target piece to the location that the player indicated.
        Parameters:
        fromRank - vertical position of the specified piece
        fromFile - horizontal position of the specified piece
        toRank - vertical position of the target position
        toFile - horizontal position of the target position
        pawnPromotionTo -
        Returns:
        0, 1, 2

      • pawnPromotion

        public void pawnPromotion(int toRank,
                          int toFile,
                          java.lang.String team)
        Checks if a pawn is eligible for pawn promotion.
        Parameters:
        toRank - vertical position of the target position
        toFile - horizontal position of the target position
        team - indicates what team it is for

      • pawnPromotionTranslator

        public void pawnPromotionTranslator(java.lang.String team,
                                    char pawnPromotionTo,
                                    int toRank,
                                    int toFile)
        Pawn promotion translator creates a new instance of the piece the pawn is promoting to.
        Parameters:
        team - indicates the team
        pawnPromotionTo - indicates what piece the pawn is promoting to
        toRank - vertical position of the new piece
        toFile - horizontal position of the new piece
